title: Client starts loading dodges Champ Select
body:
Ok now this used to happen really rarely but now i lost some LP and i dont even feel like playing this no more.

When I get into champ select after some time champ select dissappears and a blue circle starts loading. It makes me unable to ban/pick my champion and than I just dodge the game. 

Is there anything I can do to prevent this? + I cant play ranked for 30 minutes.

Please Riot fix this ASAP.{{item:3070}}


I bealieve I am NOT the only person that is having problems with this client.

replies.body: It sucks your champ select is crapping out, and I want to help!  Your connection is likely unstable and causing you to lose sync, so you won't transition to the game server.  You'll want to go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up, but definitely test it in customs for now.
